name: Slayer (2023)
description: The world has descended into madness, havoc rains at every turn. Only you can bring this disarray to a stand still. Fight alone or with friends against all odds. Gather new weapons, equipment, upgrade weapons, obtain new abilities and become and unstoppable force against your new unrelenting foes. Understand each enemies tactics and use this to your advantage to adapt your own style for survival. Discover new areas, uncover hidden secrets and learn the truth behind this mess. You are the chosen one, will you accept the challenge, Or will you give in? Good luck.
